duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the integration of data from various internal and external sources into the data warehouse model.
Oversee the day-to-day operations of the Data team of ETL/Report developers.
Assist in designing, developing, and implementing critical business intelligence initiatives and projects.
Define changes to the warehouse model and enhance processes to populate or modify warehouse data.
Architect reporting solutions on multiple projects and initiatives.
Strategically work with departments to discover KPI or data reporting needs.
Update existing BI reports and create new key performance metrics specific to drive business decisions.
Plan, diagram, and map all existing and new data connections for upcoming business intelligence engagements.
Prioritize analysis requests to balance the tactical and strategic information needs of the business.
Monitor oversight and optimize data pipelines and refreshes.
Manage and organize the Cognos development framework according to industry best practices.
Manage common administrative tasks in JIRA and liaise with Project Management staff.
Mentor and train on Cognos report development to accelerate and enhance analytic reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, Software Applications, or related field (Master's preferred)
